all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Look unto me in every thought; doubt not, fear not.
Doctrine and Covenants 6:36
Quote of the Day
"The Lord’s Church [is] not a location or a building. … The Church is simply ordinary people, disciples of Jesus Christ."
Dale G. Renlund | 1 Oct 2024General Conference
